description.value: Whenever you spend an hour in an environment of extreme heat (such as a desert during daytime or terrain with exposed lava), you gain a level of @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.ERBR3AG01H4N1L91]{Exhaustion} if you don't already have any. In addition to the normal rules for resting, exhaustion imposed by this trait can be removed by fully submerging yourself in water.
